This is a story about SpaceTours

Tech Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Greensock, Paint 3D, React, RTK, Node.js, Express, MyPHP, mySQL
Class Nasa API link, Game (space, travel, commerce)
Description This full-stack project is a mock commerce site that sells tours to planets and moons in our solar system (11 so far). You can also access the NASA API and see the picture of the day.

SpaceTours lets you use your imagination to travel out solar system. Review your personal page to see which tours you can take. Look at the NASA API database for current and past pictures. Make suggestions to taylor the experience more to your liking and leaving reviews of your pretend trip. Don't forget to connect with your friends that are currently on a voyage.

This program was used to become familiar with React18, the new router and RTK. I also learned to use Greensock with React.
